Instruction: Cook potatoes until tender, then cool and slice.
Cook green beans until crisp-tender, then rinse with cold water.
Combine tuna, potatoes, green beans, tomatoes, eggs, olives, and anchovies (if using) in a large bowl.
In a small bowl, whisk together lemon juice, Dijon mustard, salt, and pepper.
Slowly whisk in olive oil until dressing emulsifies.
Pour dressing over salad and toss gently to coat.
Serve immediately on a bed of salad greens.
